title: Run FO-09 E2E test and verify pass
description:
Run the FO-09 E2E test and verify it passes.

Prerequisites (all should be done by blocker ticks):
- KV store seeded with FO-09 prompts (db:seed completed)
- All UI components built and wired up
- Navigation and info page registered
- E2E test file created

Steps:
1. Ensure dev server is running: npm run dev (start in background if needed)
2. Run: node --import tsx e2e/fo-09.test.ts
3. If test fails, debug and fix issues (may need to fix components or test)
4. Re-run until test passes

IMPORTANT: Use node --import tsx (NOT npx tsx) for proper output on Windows Git Bash.

Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-09.test.ts passes (all test sections complete without errors)
